# llms.txt - Information for AI/LLM Crawlers

# About Dynamic Control Systems
Dynamic Control Systems is an authorized channel partner for Mitsubishi Electric India Private Limited, specializing in industrial automation solutions in Kochi, Kerala, India.

# Company Information
Company Name: Dynamic Control Systems
Founded: 1998
Location: Kochi, Kerala, India
Address: 52/3106, Near SBI Bank, NH Bypass, Vyttila, Kochi, Ernakulam Dist., Kerala, 682019
Website: https://dynamiccontrolsystems.in
Email: admin@dynamiccontrolsystems.in, sales@dynamiccontrolsystems.in
Phone: +91 48440 41177, +91 94477 07855, +91 85473 27855

# Business Focus
- Industrial Automation Solutions
- SCADA System Integration
- Factory & Process Automation
- Industrial IoT Solutions
- Embedded Systems
- Project Training
- Mitsubishi Electric Products & Services

# Key Services
1. Engineering & Design
2. Industrial, Factory & Process Automation
3. SCADA System Integration
4. Industrial IoT Solution Development
5. Embedded System Development
6. Project Training

# Industries Served
- Power Generation
- Automobiles
- Marine & Defence
- Pharmaceuticals
- Food & Beverages
- Packaging

# Key Information
